author: markrmiller
msg: Add a 5.0 note that allows us the right to add zk=truth improvements during 5.x by default.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-7033, SOLR-5961: RecoveryStrategy should not publish any state when closed / cancelled and there should always be a pause between recoveries even when recoveries are rapidly stopped and started as well as when a node attempts to become the leader for a shard.

author: markrmiller

author: tv
msg: Deactivate Torque module as it doesn't build right now.
